column5: I cant remember how many of these I made,but the kid did ok. Out of the wind is all that matters IMO.  Bet it would cost 1/3 the price or less, to build one today,then to buy a hub.LOL  Dont forget,it,s all about doing and learning.
I had one of those too...  I actually built a flip over style hut using copper pipe and tarp on a home made base with cross country skis
